Team Email Signatures

Team Email Signatures

Professional signatures for all team members

Gmail Setup Instructions
  1. Click the "Copy Signature" button for your name
  2. Open Gmail and click the gear icon → "See all settings"
  3. Scroll to the "Signature" section
  4. Click "Create new" and give it a name
  5. Paste your signature (Ctrl+V / Cmd+V) into the editor
  6. Click "Save Changes" at the bottom
